languages.text: Открывшееся вам зрелище взволновало весь офицерский состав, с упоением глядящий сквозь огромные окна мостика на поистине величественный конец одного из безымянных миров Простора Коронус. По неустановленной причине планета раскололась на несколько неравных частей, однако мощное магнитное поле до сих пор не позволяет им отправиться в холодную тьму космоса. Твердое внутреннее ядро планеты осталось почти нетронутым, и под его оболочкой, состоящей из соединений различных металлов, ежеминутно происходят тысячи взрывов, подсвечивающих сердце мира изнутри.

traits.locale_text: Открывшееся перед вами зрелище взволновало весь офицерский состав, с упоением глядящий сквозь огромные окна мостика на поистине величественный конец одного из безымянных миров Коронуса. По неустановленной причине планета раскололась на несколько неравных частей, однако мощное магнитное поле мира до сих пор не позволяет им отправиться в холодную тьму космоса. Твердое внутреннее ядро планеты осталось почти нетронутым, и под его оболочкой, состоящей из соединений различных металлов, ежеминутно происходят тысячи взрывов, подсвечивающих сердце мира изнутри.

languages.text: The sight before you has excited the officer corps, who are delighted to witness the truly majestic end of this planet through the huge windows on the bridge, one of many nameless worlds throughout the Expanse. An unknown reason caused the planet to break into several uneven parts, but its strong magnetic field is still preventing them from drifting into the cold abyss of space. The planet's hard inner core has remained almost untouched as thousands of explosions taking place under its shell of hard metals light up the world's heart from the inside.
languages.original_text: Открывшееся вам зрелище взволновало весь офицерский состав, с упоением глядящий сквозь огромные окна мостика на поистине величественный конец одного из безымянных миров Простора Коронус. По неустановленной причине планета раскололась на несколько неравных частей, однако мощное магнитное поле до сих пор не позволяет им отправиться в холодную тьму космоса. Твердое внутреннее ядро планеты осталось почти нетронутым, и под его оболочкой, состоящей из соединений различных металлов, ежеминутно происходят тысячи взрывов, подсвечивающих сердце мира изнутри.

traits.locale_text: The sight before you has excited the officer corps who are delighted to witness the truly majestic end of one of the nameless worlds through the huge windows on the bridge. An unknown reason caused the planet to break into several uneven parts, but the strong magnetic field is still preventing them from drifting into the cold abyss of space. The planet's hard inner core remained almost untouched, and there are thousands of explosions taking place under its shell of hard metals that light up the world's heart from the inside.

An unknown reason caused the planet to break into several uneven parts, but the strong magnetic field is still preventing them from drifting into the cold abyss of space. The planet's hard inner core remained almost untouched, and there are thousands of explosions taking place under its shell of hard metals that light up the world's heart from the inside.

The sight before you has excited the officer corps, who are delighted to witness the truly majestic end of this planet through the huge windows on the bridge, one of many nameless worlds throughout the expanse. An unknown reason caused the planet to break into several uneven parts, but its strong magnetic field is still preventing them from drifting into the cold abyss of space. The planet's hard inner core has remained almost untouched as thousands of explosions taking place under its shell of hard metals light up the world's heart from the inside.

An unknown reason caused the planet to break into several uneven parts, but its strong magnetic field is still preventing them from drifting into the cold abyss of space. The planet's hard inner core has remained almost untouched as thousands of explosions taking place under its shell of hard metals light up the world's heart from the inside.

The sight before you has excited the officer corps, who are delighted to witness the truly majestic end of this planet through the huge windows on the bridge, one of many nameless worlds throughout the expanse. An unknown reason caused the planet to break into several uneven parts, but its strong magnetic field is still preventing them from drifting into the cold abyss of space. The planet's hard inner core has remained almost untouched as thousands of explosions taking place under its shell of hard metals light up the world's heart from the inside.

languages.text: 眼前的景象让军官们兴奋不已，他们有幸透过舰桥上的巨窗，见证这颗正在迈向雄伟终点的行星。它是科罗努斯扩区内众多无名的世界之一。由于某种未知的原因，这颗行星碎裂成数个大大小小的碎块，但它强大的重力场攫住了这些碎块，没有让它们散佚到冰冷的太空中。在它坚硬的金属外壳下，激烈的地幔活动此起彼伏，从内部照亮了这颗行星坚不可摧的内核。
languages.original_text: The sight before you has excited the officer corps, who are delighted to witness the truly majestic end of this planet through the huge windows on the bridge, one of many nameless worlds throughout the Expanse. An unknown reason caused the planet to break into several uneven parts, but its strong magnetic field is still preventing them from drifting into the cold abyss of space. The planet's hard inner core has remained almost untouched as thousands of explosions taking place under its shell of hard metals light up the world's heart from the inside.

traits.locale_text: 眼前的景象让军官们兴奋不已，他们有幸透过舰桥上的巨窗，见证这颗正在迈向雄伟终点的行星。它是科罗努斯扩区内众多无名的世界之一。由于某种未知的原因，这颗行星碎裂成数个大大小小的碎块，但它强大的重力场攫住了这些碎块，没有让它们散佚到冰冷的太空中。在它坚硬的金属外壳下，激烈的地幔活动此起彼伏，从内部照亮了这颗行星坚不可摧的内核。

languages.text: 目の前に広がる光景に士官たちは興奮している。ブリッジの巨大な窓から、この惑星の驚くほど壮大な終焉を目の当たりにできることに喜びを感じているのだ。この星は、広大な空間に数多く存在する名もなき惑星のひとつである。未知の理由により、バラバラになってしまったが、その強力な磁場が冷たい宇宙の深淵への漂流を防いでいる。この惑星の硬い内核は、硬い金属の殻の下で起こっている何千もの爆発が惑星の中心を内側から照らす中、ほとんど手つかずのままである。
languages.original_text: The sight before you has excited the officer corps, who are delighted to witness the truly majestic end of this planet through the huge windows on the bridge, one of many nameless worlds throughout the Expanse. An unknown reason caused the planet to break into several uneven parts, but its strong magnetic field is still preventing them from drifting into the cold abyss of space. The planet's hard inner core has remained almost untouched as thousands of explosions taking place under its shell of hard metals light up the world's heart from the inside.

traits.locale_text: 目の前に広がる光景に士官たちは興奮している。ブリッジの巨大な窓から、この惑星の驚くほど壮大な終焉を目の当たりにできることに喜びを感じているのだ。この星は、広大な空間に数多く存在する名もなき惑星のひとつである。未知の理由により、バラバラになってしまったが、その強力な磁場が冷たい宇宙の深淵への漂流を防いでいる。この惑星の硬い内核は、硬い金属の殻の下で起こっている何千もの爆発が惑星の中心を内側から照らす中、ほとんど手つかずのままである。

languages.text: El espectáculo que está ocurriendo ha emocionado a los oficiales, que están encantados de presenciar a través de los enormes ventanales del puente el final verdaderamente majestuoso de este planeta, uno de los muchos mundos sin nombre de toda la Extensión. Una razón desconocida hizo que el planeta se partiera en varias partes desiguales, pero su fuerte campo magnético sigue impidiendo que vayan a la deriva hacia el frío abismo del espacio. El duro núcleo interno del planeta ha permanecido casi intacto mientras miles de explosiones que tienen lugar bajo su coraza de metales duros iluminan el corazón del mundo desde su interior.
languages.original_text: The sight before you has excited the officer corps, who are delighted to witness the truly majestic end of this planet through the huge windows on the bridge, one of many nameless worlds throughout the Expanse. An unknown reason caused the planet to break into several uneven parts, but its strong magnetic field is still preventing them from drifting into the cold abyss of space. The planet's hard inner core has remained almost untouched as thousands of explosions taking place under its shell of hard metals light up the world's heart from the inside.

traits.locale_text: El espectáculo que está ocurriendo ha emocionado a los oficiales, que están encantados de presenciar a través de los enormes ventanales del puente el final verdaderamente majestuoso de este planeta, uno de los muchos mundos sin nombre de toda la Extensión. Una razón desconocida hizo que el planeta se partiera en varias partes desiguales, pero su fuerte campo magnético sigue impidiendo que vayan a la deriva hacia el frío abismo del espacio. El duro núcleo interno del planeta ha permanecido casi intacto mientras miles de explosiones que tienen lugar bajo su coraza de metales duros iluminan el corazón del mundo desde su interior.{g|Encyclopedia:Witness}{/g}

languages.text: Der Anblick vor Euch hat die Offiziere verzückt. Sie freuen sich, das wahrlich majestätische Ende dieses Planeten — einer der vielen namenlosen Welten in der Ausdehnung — durch die riesigen Fenster der Brücke mitzuerleben. Aus unbekanntem Grund ist der Planet in mehrere unterschiedlich große Teile zerbrochen. Sein starkes Magnetfeld hindert diese Teile aber weiterhin daran, ins kalte Nichts des Alls abzudriften. Der harte innere Kern des Planeten ist fast ungerührt geblieben, während Tausende von Explosionen unter seiner Kruste aus harten Metallen das Herz der Welt von innen erleuchten.
languages.original_text: The sight before you has excited the officer corps, who are delighted to witness the truly majestic end of this planet through the huge windows on the bridge, one of many nameless worlds throughout the Expanse. An unknown reason caused the planet to break into several uneven parts, but its strong magnetic field is still preventing them from drifting into the cold abyss of space. The planet's hard inner core has remained almost untouched as thousands of explosions taking place under its shell of hard metals light up the world's heart from the inside.

traits.locale_text: Der Anblick vor Euch hat die Offiziere verzückt. Sie freuen sich, das wahrlich majestätische Ende dieses Planeten — einer der vielen namenlosen Welten in der Ausdehnung — durch die riesigen Fenster der Brücke mitzuerleben. Aus unbekanntem Grund ist der Planet in mehrere unterschiedlich große Teile zerbrochen. Sein starkes Magnetfeld hinter diese Teile aber weiterhin daran, ins kalte Nichts des Alls abzudriften. Der harte innere Kern des Planeten ist fast ungerührt geblieben, während Tausende von Explosionen unter seiner Kruste aus harten Metallen das Herz der Welt von innen erleuchten.

languages.text: Le spectacle qui s'offre à vous enchante les officiers supérieurs, ravis de pouvoir assister depuis les vastes baies vitrées de la passerelle à la fin majestueuse d'un des innombrables mondes anonymes des Étendues. Pour une raison inconnue, la planète s'est fragmentée en plusieurs parties inégales, mais son puissant champ magnétique les empêche de dériver dans les abîmes glacials de l'espace. Son noyau interne solide demeure pour ainsi dire intact alors que les milliers d'explosions simultanées qui ébranlent son enveloppe de métaux durs éclairent son cœur de l'intérieur.
languages.original_text: The sight before you has excited the officer corps, who are delighted to witness the truly majestic end of this planet through the huge windows on the bridge, one of many nameless worlds throughout the Expanse. An unknown reason caused the planet to break into several uneven parts, but its strong magnetic field is still preventing them from drifting into the cold abyss of space. The planet's hard inner core has remained almost untouched as thousands of explosions taking place under its shell of hard metals light up the world's heart from the inside.

Son noyau interne solide demeure pour ainsi dire intact alors que les milliers d'explosions simultanées qui ébranlent son enveloppe de métaux durs éclairent son cœur de l'intérieur.

languages.text: Köprüdeki devasa pencerelerden bakınca karşına çıkan manzara, subay kademelerini heyecanlandırıp keyif vermiş: Enginlikteki nice isimsiz gezegenden biri, gözlerinin önünde tüm görkemiyle son bulmak üzere. Bu gezegen meçhul bir sebeple pek çok değişken parçaya bölünmüş olsa da, güçlü manyetik alanı sayesinde parçaları uzayın soğuk boşluğuna sürüklenememiş. Gezegenin sert iç çekirdeği neredeyse sağlam kalmayı başarmış. Sert metallerden oluşan kabuğunun altında gerçekleşen binlerce patlama ise gezegenin kalbini içten aydınlatıyor.
languages.original_text: The sight before you has excited the officer corps, who are delighted to witness the truly majestic end of this planet through the huge windows on the bridge, one of many nameless worlds throughout the Expanse. An unknown reason caused the planet to break into several uneven parts, but its strong magnetic field is still preventing them from drifting into the cold abyss of space. The planet's hard inner core has remained almost untouched as thousands of explosions taking place under its shell of hard metals light up the world's heart from the inside.
